import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import SubmitButton from '../../../../Components/UI/Button/Button' import { set, useForm } from 'react-hook-form' import * as actionCreators from "../../../../Service/Action/action"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import './Faculty.css' import Autocomplete from 'react-autocomplete' const AddFaculty = (props) => { const { register, handleSubmit, formState: { errors }, reset } = useForm({ mode: "onTouched", }); const [flag,setFlag] = usestate() const [value, setValue] = useState(''); const onSubmit = (data, e) => { e.preventDefault(); if(value==''){ setFlag(true); } } const handleClick = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); props.setTrigger(false); } return (props.trigger) ? (

Add Faculty

{errors.Name?.message}

{errors.email?.message}

item.sub.toLowerCase() .indexOf(value.toLowerCase()) > -1} getItemValue={item => item.sub} renderItem={(item, isHighlighted) =>
{item.sub}
} value={value} onChange={e => setValue(e.target.value)} onSelect={(val) => setValue(val)} inputProps={{ style: { width: "287px", height: "32px", background: "#F7F7F7", border: "1px transparent", padding: "12px", borderRadius: "4px", marginBottom: "7%", fontFamily:"'Inter', sans-serif" }, placeholder: '--Search Subject--' }} menuStyle={{ borderRadius: "3px", boxShadow: "rgb(0 0 0 / 10%) 0px 2px 12p", background: "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9)", padding:" 2px 0px", fontSize: "90%", position: "fixed", overflow: "auto", maxHeight: "18%", left: "477.415px", top: "351.957px", minWidth: "286.989px", fontFamily:"'Inter', sans-serif" }} />

{errors.password?.message}

) : null; } export default AddFaculty
